channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Long abandoned bikes, 30th October
item.description:
These bikes have been here for years and even though Westminster attached labels to say they would be removed in 48 hours, that was weeks ago. Labels gone, bikes still there and now jagged shards waiting to cause someone an injury...please act!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Golden Square, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect signage, 30th October
item.description:
The replacement ATS for traffic leaving the high street at the junction Westmoreland road appears to have been replaced with a single light set with an ahead only traffic sign which would make it illegal to turn right into Westmoreland Road. This would cause significant problems for a number of bus routes .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Westmoreland Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads for flytipping in the river, causing a build up of detritus, 30th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Brook Road, Poverest, London

item.title: LTN toblerone display around lampost - out of date, 30th October
item.description:
There is an out-of-date LTN proposal display around a lampost even though the LTN is now installed. It is torn & ripped. It just needs to be removed. Located opposite the entrance to St Andrews primary school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lingham Street, Stockwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
